exploreUrl:
<js>
var result = []
var push = (title, url, size) => result.push({
  title: title,
  url: url,
  style: {
    layout_flexGrow: 1,
    layout_flexBasisPercent: size
  }
});
var tg = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax('https://mangguoshufang.com/0/list/1.html')).select('.x-category__box:nth-of-type(1) a');

tg.forEach(tag => {
	  var nam = tag.text()
	  ul = String(tag.attr('href')).replace(/1\.html/,"{{page}}.html");
    push(nam,ul,0.25);
});

JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
sckey = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(source.key + "search")).select(".page-search").attr("data-id");
//java.log(sckey);
body = {
  "body": `name=${key}&tags=&type=3&tt=&page_index=${page}&app=2&searchkey=${sckey}`,
  "headers":{"Referer":source.key},
  "method": "POST"
}
result = source.key + "api/search/list" + "," + JSON.stringify(body);
result;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html",ml);
    java.longToast("æ­£æ–‡è§£å¯†å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè½¬ä¸ºwebViewåŠ¨æ€åŠ è½½ã€‚");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
	  // éå†æ•°ç»„ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨é˜…è¯»å†…ç½®Base64è§£ç æ–¹æ³•
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if (baseUrl.startsWith('data')) {
    let decodedData = String(java.hexDecodeToString(src));
    let [ruleStr, initialUrl] = decodedData.split('|');
    let finalUrl = initialUrl;
    let initialCount = 0;
    const finalCount = 10;
    while (initialCount < finalCount) {
            initialCount++;
            let Content = java.ajax(source.key + finalUrl);
            let thUrl = java.getString(ruleStr, Content);
            finalUrl = thUrl;
         if (!thUrl.includes('_')) break;
    }
    result = java.ajax(source.key + finalUrl);
    java.setContent(result);
}
result;
</js>
#content > :not(a)@html

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let pages = Array.from(java.getStringList('option@value', null, true));

var chapters = java.ajaxAll(pages).flatMap(m => {
    let chapterLists = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(m.body()).select('.section-list');
    return Array.from(chapterLists.get(1).select('a'));
});

var list = chapters.map((item, i) => {
    let url = String(item.attr('href'));
    if (!url) {
        let thUrl = i < chapters.length - 1 ? chapters[i+1].attr('href') : chapters[i-1].attr('href');
        let ruleStr = i < chapters.length - 1 ? "#prev_url@href" : "#next_url@href";
       if (String(thUrl)) url = "data:;base64," + java.base64Encode(ruleStr + "|" + thUrl) + ',{"type": "chapter"}';
    }
    //java.log(url)
    return { 
        name: item.text(), 
        Url: url
    };
});
list;
</js>
